text: Paul [strongs id="g3972" /], an apostle [strongs id="g0652" /] of Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] by [strongs id="g1223" /] the will [strongs id="g2307" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /], according to [strongs id="g2596" /] the promise [strongs id="g1860" /] of life [strongs id="g2222" /] which [strongs id="g3588" /] is in [strongs id="g1722" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /],

To Timothy [strongs id="g5095" /], [my] dearly beloved [strongs id="g0027" /] son [strongs id="g5043" /]: Grace [strongs id="g5485" /], mercy [strongs id="g1656" /], [and] peace [strongs id="g1515" /], from [strongs id="g0575" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] the Father [strongs id="g3962" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Lord [strongs id="g2962" /].

I thank [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActInd" /] [strongs id="g5485" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /], whom [strongs id="g3739" /] I serve [strongs id="g3000" m="PresActInd" /] from [strongs id="g0575" /] [my] forefathers [strongs id="g4269" /] with [strongs id="g1722" /] pure [strongs id="g2513" /] conscience [strongs id="g4893" /], that [strongs id="g5613" /] without ceasing [strongs id="g0088" /] I have [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActInd" /] remembrance [strongs id="g3417" /] of [strongs id="g4012" /] thee [strongs id="g4675" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] my [strongs id="g3450" /] prayers [strongs id="g1162" /] night [strongs id="g3571" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] day [strongs id="g2250" /];

Greatly desiring [strongs id="g1971" m="PresActPtc" /] to see [strongs id="g1492" m="Aor2ActInf" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /], being mindful [strongs id="g3415" m="PerfPasPtc" /] of thy [strongs id="g4675" /] tears [strongs id="g1144" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] I may be filled [strongs id="g4137" m="AorPasSubj" /] with joy [strongs id="g5479" /];

When I call [strongs id="g2983" m="PresActPtc" /] to remembrance [strongs id="g5280" /] the unfeigned [strongs id="g0505" /] faith [strongs id="g4102" /] that is in [strongs id="g1722" /] thee [strongs id="g4671" /], which [strongs id="g3748" /] dwelt [strongs id="g1774" m="AorActInd" /] first [strongs id="g4412" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] thy [strongs id="g4675" /] grandmother [strongs id="g3125" /] Lois [strongs id="g3090" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] thy [strongs id="g4675" /] mother [strongs id="g3384" /] Eunice [strongs id="g2131" /]; and [strongs id="g1161" /] I am persuaded [strongs id="g3982" m="PerfPasInd" /] that [strongs id="g3754" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] thee [strongs id="g4671" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /].

Wherefore [strongs id="g1223" /] [strongs id="g3739" /] [strongs id="g0156" /] I put [strongs id="g0363" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /] in remembrance [strongs id="g0363" m="PresActInd" /] that thou stir up [strongs id="g0329" m="PresActInf" /] the gift [strongs id="g5486" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /], which [strongs id="g3739" /] is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] thee [strongs id="g4671" /] by [strongs id="g1223" /] the putting on [strongs id="g1936" /] of my [strongs id="g3450" /] hands [strongs id="g5495" /].

For [strongs id="g1063" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] hath [strongs id="g1325" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] given [strongs id="g1325" m="AorActInd" /] us [strongs id="g2254" /] the spirit [strongs id="g4151" /] of fear [strongs id="g1167" /]; but [strongs id="g0235" /] of power [strongs id="g1411" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] of love [strongs id="g0026" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] of a sound mind [strongs id="g4995" /].

Be [strongs id="g1870" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /] thou [strongs id="g1870" /] therefore [strongs id="g3767" /] ashamed [strongs id="g1870" m="AorPasDepSubj" /] of the testimony [strongs id="g3142" /] of our [strongs id="g2257" /] Lord [strongs id="g2962" /], nor [strongs id="g3366" /] of me [strongs id="g1691" /] his [strongs id="g0846" /] prisoner [strongs id="g1198" /]: but [strongs id="g0235" /] be thou partaker of the afflictions [strongs id="g4777" m="AorActImpr" /] of the gospel [strongs id="g2098" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] the power [strongs id="g1411" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /];

Who [strongs id="g3588" /] hath saved [strongs id="g4982" m="AorActPtc" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] called [strongs id="g2564" m="AorActPtc" /] [us] with an holy [strongs id="g0040" /] calling [strongs id="g2821" /], not [strongs id="g3756" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] works [strongs id="g2041" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] his own [strongs id="g2398" /] purpose [strongs id="g4286" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] grace [strongs id="g5485" /], which [strongs id="g3588" /] was given [strongs id="g1325" m="AorPasPtc" /] us [strongs id="g2254" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] before [strongs id="g4253" /] the world began [strongs id="g5550" /] [strongs id="g0166" /],

But [strongs id="g1161" /] is [strongs id="g5319" /] now [strongs id="g3568" /] made manifest [strongs id="g5319" m="AorPasPtc" /] by [strongs id="g1223" /] the appearing [strongs id="g2015" /] of our [strongs id="g2257" /] Saviour [strongs id="g4990" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], who [strongs id="g3303" /] hath abolished [strongs id="g2673" m="AorActPtc" /] death [strongs id="g2288" /], and [strongs id="g1161" /] hath brought [strongs id="g5461" /] life [strongs id="g2222" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] immortality [strongs id="g0861" /] to light [strongs id="g5461" m="AorActPtc" /] through [strongs id="g1223" /] the gospel [strongs id="g2098" /]:

Whereunto [strongs id="g1519" /] [strongs id="g3739" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] am appointed [strongs id="g5087" m="AorPasInd" /] a preacher [strongs id="g2783" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] an apostle [strongs id="g0652" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] a teacher [strongs id="g1320" /] of the Gentiles [strongs id="g1484" /].

For [strongs id="g1223" /] the which [strongs id="g3739" /] cause [strongs id="g0156" /] I [strongs id="g3958" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] suffer [strongs id="g3958" m="PresActInd" /] these things [strongs id="g5023" /]: nevertheless [strongs id="g0235" /] I am [strongs id="g1870" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] ashamed [strongs id="g1870" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /]: for [strongs id="g1063" /] I know [strongs id="g1492" m="PerfActInd" /] whom [strongs id="g3739" /] I have believed [strongs id="g4100" m="PerfActInd" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] am persuaded [strongs id="g3982" m="PerfPasInd" /] that [strongs id="g3754" /] he is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] able [strongs id="g1415" /] to keep [strongs id="g5442" m="AorActInf" /] that which I [strongs id="g3450" /] have committed unto him [strongs id="g3866" /] against [strongs id="g1519" /] that [strongs id="g1565" /] day [strongs id="g2250" /].

Hold fast [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActImpr" /] the form [strongs id="g5296" /] of sound [strongs id="g5198" m="PresActPtc" /] words [strongs id="g3056" /], which [strongs id="g3739" /] thou hast heard [strongs id="g0191" m="AorActInd" /] of [strongs id="g3844" /] me [strongs id="g1700" /], in [strongs id="g1722" /] faith [strongs id="g4102" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] love [strongs id="g0026" /] which [strongs id="g3588" /] is in [strongs id="g1722" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /].

That good thing [strongs id="g2570" /] which was committed unto thee [strongs id="g3872" /] keep [strongs id="g5442" m="AorActImpr" /] by [strongs id="g1223" /] the Holy [strongs id="g0040" /] Ghost [strongs id="g4151" /] which [strongs id="g3588" /] dwelleth [strongs id="g1774" m="PresActPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] us [strongs id="g2254" /].

This [strongs id="g5124" /] thou knowest [strongs id="g1492" m="PerfActInd" /], that [strongs id="g3754" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] they which are in [strongs id="g1722" /] Asia [strongs id="g0773" /] be turned away from [strongs id="g0654" m="Aor2PasDepSubj" /] me [strongs id="g3165" /]; of whom [strongs id="g3739" /] are [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] Phygellus [strongs id="g5436" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] Hermogenes [strongs id="g2061" /].

The Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] give [strongs id="g1325" m="Aor2ActOpt" /] mercy [strongs id="g1656" /] unto the house [strongs id="g3624" /] of Onesiphorus [strongs id="g3683" /]; for [strongs id="g3754" /] he [strongs id="g0404" /] oft [strongs id="g4178" /] refreshed [strongs id="g0404" m="AorActInd" /] me [strongs id="g3165" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] was [strongs id="g1870" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] ashamed [strongs id="g1870" m="AorPasInd" /] of my [strongs id="g3450" /] chain [strongs id="g0254" /]:

But [strongs id="g0235" /], when he was [strongs id="g1096" m="Aor2MidDepPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] Rome [strongs id="g4516" /], he sought [strongs id="g2212" /] me [strongs id="g3165" /] out [strongs id="g2212" m="AorActInd" /] very diligently [strongs id="g4706" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] found [strongs id="g2147" m="Aor2ActInd" /] [me].

The Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] grant [strongs id="g1325" m="Aor2ActOpt" /] unto him [strongs id="g0846" /] that he may find [strongs id="g2147" m="Aor2ActInf" /] mercy [strongs id="g1656" /] of [strongs id="g3844" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] that [strongs id="g1565" /] day [strongs id="g2250" /]: and [strongs id="g2532" /] in how many things [strongs id="g3745" /] he ministered unto me [strongs id="g1247" m="AorActInd" /] at [strongs id="g1722" /] Ephesus [strongs id="g2181" /], thou [strongs id="g4771" /] knowest [strongs id="g1097" m="PresActInd" /] very well [strongs id="g0957" /].

Thou [strongs id="g4771" /] therefore [strongs id="g3767" /], my [strongs id="g3450" /] son [strongs id="g5043" /], be strong [strongs id="g1743" m="PresPasImpr" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the grace [strongs id="g5485" /] that is in [strongs id="g1722" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /].

And [strongs id="g2532" /] the things [strongs id="g3739" /] that thou hast heard [strongs id="g0191" m="AorActInd" /] of [strongs id="g3844" /] me [strongs id="g1700" /] among [strongs id="g1223" /] many [strongs id="g4183" /] witnesses [strongs id="g3144" /], the same [strongs id="g5023" /] commit thou [strongs id="g3908" m="Aor2MidInd" /] to faithful [strongs id="g4103" /] men [strongs id="g0444" /], who [strongs id="g3748" /] shall be [strongs id="g2071" m="FutInd" /] able [strongs id="g2425" /] to teach [strongs id="g1321" m="AorActInf" /] others [strongs id="g2087" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /].

Thou [strongs id="g4771" /] therefore [strongs id="g3767" /] endure hardness [strongs id="g2553" m="AorActImpr" /], as [strongs id="g5613" /] a good [strongs id="g2570" /] soldier [strongs id="g4757" /] of Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /].

No man [strongs id="g3762" /] that warreth [strongs id="g4754" m="PresMidPtc" /] entangleth himself [strongs id="g1707" m="PresPasInd" /] with the affairs [strongs id="g4230" /] of [this] life [strongs id="g0979" /]; that [strongs id="g2443" /] he may please [strongs id="g0700" m="AorActSubj" /] him who hath chosen him to be a soldier [strongs id="g4758" m="AorActPtc" /].

And [strongs id="g1161" /] if [strongs id="g1437" /] a man [strongs id="g5100" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] strive [strongs id="g0118" m="PresActSubj" /] for masteries, [yet] is he [strongs id="g4737" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] crowned [strongs id="g4737" m="PresPasInd" /], except [strongs id="g3362" /] he strive [strongs id="g0118" m="AorActSubj" /] lawfully [strongs id="g3545" /].

The husbandman [strongs id="g1092" /] that laboureth [strongs id="g2872" m="PresActPtc" /] must be [strongs id="g1163" m="PresInd" /] first [strongs id="g4413" /] partaker [strongs id="g3335" m="PresActInf" /] of the fruits [strongs id="g2590" /].

Consider [strongs id="g3539" m="PresActImpr" /] what [strongs id="g3739" /] I say [strongs id="g3004" m="PresActInd" /]; and [strongs id="g1063" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] give [strongs id="g1325" m="Aor2ActOpt" /] thee [strongs id="g4671" /] understanding [strongs id="g4907" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] all things [strongs id="g3956" /].

Remember [strongs id="g3421" m="PresActImpr" /] that Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] of [strongs id="g1537" /] the seed [strongs id="g4690" /] of David [strongs id="g1138" /] was raised [strongs id="g1453" m="PerfPasPtc" /] from [strongs id="g1537" /] the dead [strongs id="g3498" /] according to [strongs id="g2596" /] my [strongs id="g3450" /] gospel [strongs id="g2098" /]:

Wherein [strongs id="g1722" /] [strongs id="g3739" /] I suffer trouble [strongs id="g2553" m="PresActInd" /], as [strongs id="g5613" /] an evil doer [strongs id="g2557" /], [even] unto [strongs id="g3360" /] bonds [strongs id="g1199" /]; but [strongs id="g0235" /] the word [strongs id="g3056" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] is [strongs id="g1210" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] bound [strongs id="g1210" m="PerfPasInd" /].

Therefore [strongs id="g1223" /] [strongs id="g5124" /] I endure [strongs id="g5278" m="PresActInd" /] all things [strongs id="g3956" /] for [strongs id="g1588" /] the elect’s [strongs id="g1588" /] sakes [strongs id="g1223" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] they [strongs id="g0846" /] may [strongs id="g5177" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] obtain [strongs id="g5177" m="Aor2ActSubj" /] the salvation [strongs id="g4991" /] which [strongs id="g3588" /] is in [strongs id="g1722" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] with [strongs id="g3326" /] eternal [strongs id="g0166" /] glory [strongs id="g1391" /].

[It is] a faithful [strongs id="g4103" /] saying [strongs id="g3056" /]: For [strongs id="g1063" /] if [strongs id="g1487" /] we be dead with [strongs id="g4880" m="Aor2ActInd" /] [him], we shall [strongs id="g4800" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] live with [strongs id="g4800" m="FutActInd" /] [him]:

If [strongs id="g1487" /] we suffer [strongs id="g5278" m="PresActInd" /], we shall [strongs id="g4821" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] reign with [strongs id="g4821" m="FutActInd" /] [him]: if [strongs id="g1487" /] we deny [strongs id="g0720" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] [him], he also [strongs id="g2548" /] will deny [strongs id="g0720" m="FutMidDepInd" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /]:

If [strongs id="g1487" /] we believe not [strongs id="g0569" m="PresActInd" /], [yet] he [strongs id="g1565" /] abideth [strongs id="g3306" m="PresActInd" /] faithful [strongs id="g4103" /]: he cannot [strongs id="g3756" /] [strongs id="g1410" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] deny [strongs id="g0720" m="AorMidDepInf" /] himself [strongs id="g1438" /].

Of these things [strongs id="g5023" /] put [them] in remembrance [strongs id="g5279" m="PresActImpr" /], charging [strongs id="g1263" m="PresMidPasDepPtc" /] [them] before [strongs id="g1799" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] that they strive [strongs id="g3054" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /] about words [strongs id="g3054" m="PresActInf" /] to [strongs id="g1519" /] no [strongs id="g3762" /] profit [strongs id="g5539" /], [but] to [strongs id="g1909" /] the subverting [strongs id="g2692" /] of the hearers [strongs id="g0191" m="PresActPtc" /].

Study [strongs id="g4704" m="AorActImpr" /] to shew [strongs id="g3936" m="AorActInf" /] thyself [strongs id="g4572" /] approved [strongs id="g1384" /] unto God [strongs id="g2316" /], a workman [strongs id="g2040" /] that needeth not to be ashamed [strongs id="g0422" /], rightly dividing [strongs id="g3718" m="PresActPtc" /] the word [strongs id="g3056" /] of truth [strongs id="g0225" /].

But [strongs id="g1161" /] shun [strongs id="g4026" m="PresMidImpr" /] profane [strongs id="g0952" /] [and] vain babblings [strongs id="g2757" /]: for [strongs id="g1063" /] they will increase [strongs id="g4298" m="FutActInd" /] unto [strongs id="g1909" /] more [strongs id="g4119" /] ungodliness [strongs id="g0763" /].

And [strongs id="g2532" /] their [strongs id="g0846" /] word [strongs id="g3056" /] will eat [strongs id="g2192" m="FutActInd" /] [strongs id="g3542" /] as [strongs id="g5613" /] doth a canker [strongs id="g1044" /]: of whom [strongs id="g3739" /] is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] Hymenaeus [strongs id="g5211" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] Philetus [strongs id="g5372" /];

Who [strongs id="g3748" /] concerning [strongs id="g4012" /] the truth [strongs id="g0225" /] have erred [strongs id="g0795" m="AorActInd" /], saying [strongs id="g3004" m="PresActPtc" /] that the resurrection [strongs id="g0386" /] is past [strongs id="g1096" m="Perf2ActInf" /] already [strongs id="g2235" /]; and [strongs id="g2532" /] overthrow [strongs id="g0396" m="PresActInd" /] the faith [strongs id="g4102" /] of some [strongs id="g5100" /].

Nevertheless [strongs id="g3305" /] the foundation [strongs id="g2310" /] of God [strongs id="g2316" /] standeth [strongs id="g2476" tvm="ImpfActInd" tvm2="PerfActInd" /] sure [strongs id="g4731" /], having [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActPtc" /] this [strongs id="g5026" /] seal [strongs id="g4973" /], The Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] knoweth [strongs id="g1097" m="Aor2ActInd" /] them that are [strongs id="g5607" m="PresPtc" /] his [strongs id="g0846" /]. And [strongs id="g2532" /], Let [strongs id="g0868" /] every one [strongs id="g3956" /] that nameth [strongs id="g3687" m="PresActPtc" /] the name [strongs id="g3686" /] of Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] depart [strongs id="g0868" m="Aor2ActImpr" /] from [strongs id="g0575" /] iniquity [strongs id="g0093" /].
